message.body: Thanks for understanding my project yesterday
I really feel better knowing that you understood it
Also your English is getting so good!!!! You know how tone quick witted and sassy now!!!!!
ha, I was sassy yesterday?
I know you're trying to deliver a metaphysical, an abstract idea
your sight refer to a whole input, incluse every way we receive data/information

last semester we had a conversation, I said I have difficulty to explain my ideas, you said you have the same problem too. I think that's because we are both trying to express some kind of feelings which is difficult to others who don't feel it
U were sassy with Azeem it was awesome
the good thing is I feel you through your building, through the your choice of words
you built a concrete building to deliver an abstract idea, and you made a success of it
U making me so happy
Really. Maybe it wasn't that successful though
Azeem didn't get the idea is because he is always thinking in a superficial way
never take Azeem's opinion in mind
ha ha
Cause no one else got it
Azeem is on a different page than me
I need to distance myself from him intellectually
He's ideas and his intelligence are very different from mine he will never understand what I do in a way that will help me
But I think for next week I need to get very specific
provide some examples for the audience for them to feel
And more concrete
So that I can refine and better define the abstract ideas
